description.content:
Returns a list of all gift cards available from a gift card provider for a specific cart or customer.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
Gift card provider endpoint URL.
Pagination control. This query variable must follow the format _resources={from}-{to}_.
(Required) The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
Gift card provider endpoint URL.
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
(Required) Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json
(Required) The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json
Pagination control. This query variable must follow the format _resources={from}-{to}_.
(Required) The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

Returns information for a specific gift card from a gift card provider.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
(Required) Gift card identification.

(Required) The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) Gift card identification.
Gift card provider endpoint URL.
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
(Required) Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json
(Required) The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json
(Required) The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

Creates a gift card for a specific user in a gift card provider.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

Creates a transaction (credit or debit) for a gift card in a gift card provider and authorizes the item reservation.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
(Required) Gift card identification.
Gift card provider endpoint URL.
(Required) The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

description.content:
Returns the IDs of all transactions performed in a gift card provider for a specific gift card.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
(Required) Gift card identification.
Gift card provider endpoint URL.
(Required) The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) Gift card identification.
Gift card provider endpoint URL.

(Required) Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json
(Required) The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json
(Required) The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
(Required) The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

This request can be used to:

1. Cancel a transaction for a specific gift card in a gift card provider.

2. Cancel an item's reservation or create a refund.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [authentication](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication) or [permissions](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).

>ℹ️ Onboarding guide > > Check the new [Payments onboarding guide](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/payments-overview). We created this guide to improve the onboarding experience for developers at VTEX. It assembles all documentation on our Developer Portal about Payments and is organized by focusing on the developer's journey. The **Gift Card Provider Protocol** is a set of definitions to help you integrate your Gift Card API into VTEX platform. To achieve this, you need to implement a web API (REST) following the specifications from this documentation and configure your provider in your store using [Gift Card Hub API](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-hub-api#overview). ## Common parameters in the documentation
{{providerApiEndpoint}} Provider's endpoint for the implementation (mandatory)
{{X-PROVIDER-API-AppKey}} The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional)
{{X-PROVIDER-API-AppToken}} The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional)
## Giftcard Provider Protocol API Index ### Gift Cards - `POST` [Create GiftCard](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#post-/giftcards) - `GET` [Get GiftCard by ID](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#get-/giftcards/-giftCardId-) - `POST` [List All GiftCards](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#post-/giftcards/_search) ### Transactions - `POST` [Create GiftCard Transaction](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#post-/giftcards/-giftCardId-/transactions) - `GET` [Get GiftCard Transaction by ID](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#get-/giftcards/-giftCardId-/transactions/-transactionId-) - `GET` [List All GiftCard Transactions](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#get-/giftcards/-giftCardId-/transactions) - `GET` [Get GiftCard Transaction Authorization](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#get-/giftcards/-giftCardId-/transactions/-transactionId-/authorization) - `POST` [Cancel GiftCard Transaction](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#post-/giftcards/-giftCardId-/transactions/-transactionId-/cancellations) - `GET` [List All GiftCard Transactions Cancellations](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#get-/giftcards/-giftCardId-/transactions/-transactionId-/cancellations) - `POST` [Settle GiftCard Transaction](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#post-/giftcards/-giftCardId-/transactions/-tId-/settlements) - `GET` [List All GiftCard Transactions Settlements](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/giftcard-provider-protocol#get-/giftcards/-giftCardId-/transactions/-tId-/settlements)
